name: CHICKASAW NATION
sampleDescriptions:
Monitor gaming legislation, regulations and National Indian Gaming Commission
Draft HR ____  Restoration of America's Wire Act
Sports betting
Monitor infrastructure enhancement legislation, including Tribal Transportation Program

Tax reform generally as it relates to Indian tribes

Monitor legislation and regulations on 8(a) programs
